stlib.interfaces.unit.spatial.util

Interface MovableSegmentIF

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MovableSpatial
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MovableSegment

    public interface MovableSegmentIF
extends MovableSpatial
    Interface for MovableSegmentIF objects, generally used for representing the bounding box of spatial objects
    Author:
    Markus Fuessel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SegmentIF getFinal()
      Get the final 'SegmentIF' object at the end of the movement
      PointIF getFinalEndPoint()
      Get the end point at the end of the movement
      PointIF getFinalStartPoint()
      Get the start point at the end of the movement
      SegmentIF getInitial()
      Get the initial 'SegmentIF' object at the beginning of the movement
      PointIF getInitialEndPoint()
      Get the end point at the beginning of the movement
      PointIF getInitialStartPoint()
      Get the start point at the beginning of the movement
      SegmentIF getValue(PeriodIF movementPeriod, TimeInstantIF instant)
      This method returns a 'SegmentIF' which is valid at the passed time instant within the period of the movement of this 'MovableSegmentIF'

      • Methods inherited from interface stlib.interfaces.features.MovableSpatial

        getProjectionBoundingBox

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        SegmentIF getValue(PeriodIF movementPeriod,
                   TimeInstantIF instant)
        This method returns a 'SegmentIF' which is valid at the passed time instant within the period of the movement of this 'MovableSegmentIF'
        Parameters:
        movementPeriod - - the period in which the movement of this segment is defined
        instant - - time instant
        Returns:
        a defined 'SegmentIF' which is valid at the passed instant, otherwise the returned 'SegmentIF' is undefined
